subject: WELCOME TO NORTH SHORE BANK UN
body:
WELCOME TO NORTH SHORE BANK UNITED STATE OF AMERICA.
DESK OF SIR-MR. DAVID LA'FLAMME
PRESIDENT-CEO NORTH SHORE BANK
Attention Dear Friend:
We wish to congratulate you over your success in our computer
balloting sweep-stake held on 16th JAN, 2023 yearly Donation Promo
from the US government's Treasury and UNITED NATION OFFICE. This is a
millennium scientific computer permission fund. This transaction
includes every foreign contractor that may have not received their
contract sum due to bad Authorization Government official staff.
Some people that have had an unfinished transaction or international
businesses that failed due to problems or irregularities by
governments etc. This has been agreed upon and has been signed by the
Board of Directors and Trustees of the United Nations Office and IMF
OFFICE and UN OFFICE.
I'm using this great opportunity to inform you that your approval of
donation funds worth the sum of $5 million US dollars have been
approved and ready to be released to you through our Bank scheduly
North Shore Bank system.
THIS IS THE INFORMATION WE NEED FROM YOU.
Your name:
Your Country: State & City:
Your Occupation:
Home address:
Your Phone Number:
I await your quick response.
Regards Signed / Yours Faithfully,
Sir. Mr. David LaFlamme - President & CEO - North Shore Bank
Address: 248 Andover St, Peabody, Massachusetts, 01960, United States.

subject: Re: WELCOME TO NORTH SHORE BANK UN
body:
Hello Sir. Mr. David President CEO North Shore Bank,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this exciting news with me! I'm thrilled to hear about the yearly Donation Promo from the US Treasury and UNITED NATION OFFICE.

I'm curious, how was I selected for this donation? And could you please explain more about this "millennium scientific computer permission fund"? It sounds fascinating!

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Leonardo
